Articles.Content:
Hello all, long time lurker, first time poster. Thought I\'d make myself known since games with this level of simulation always scratch my nerd itch, and I often find that the communities around them are full of awesome people.

Also, I\'m studying physics and astrophysics at university, so... this kind of counts as revision, right? Right?

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Mince

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!
